name: ShiftOS Remade
description:
Welcome to the world of ShiftOS. Your computer has been formatted, and you need to try to survive as long as you can in the OS without getting viruses and being infected with malware. However, the current version, ShiftOS 0.0.3, only contains a few big features, like a desktop panel, a clock, borders, and a titlebar.

ShiftOS 0.0.3 was released on May 31, 2022.
